description: rust-red ground paper applied to white sheet; predominately rectangular pieces of colored paper, mainly applied to LRQ--oranges, reds, purple, browns, cream-colored
marks: Signature and Date LRC, in black: [W. Dole 1962]
provenance: [Rex Evans Gallery, Los Angeles, until 1965; sold for $374.40, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1965-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Like Red
